LOGIN.TermsAndConditionsPopUp: Terms and conditions applied in accordance with laws, regularities and customs regulations
LOGIN.TERMS_CONDITIONS: By login to the application ,it implies that you reviewed and agreed to the
LOGIN.LOGIN_PAGE_DESCRIPTION_TEXT: The General Administration of Customs is the oldest governmental authority in Kuwait that was established by Kuwait's seventh ruler, H.H. Sheikh Mubarak Al Kabeer in 1899 to affirm the economic, political, and security principles and supremacy on the Kuwaiti borders. Consequently, and through the successive generations, we should work according to a highly advanced organization.
LOGIN.LOGIN_PAGE_ORG_ALLOW_SERVICE: Organization eServices allow the companies to apply for services electronically by registering an account on the Customs eServices platform; Upon having an active account, you can start using the following eServices:
LOGIN.LOGIN_PAGE_BROKER_ALLOW_SERVICE: Customs Broker eServices allow to apply for Broker Affair Services electronically by registering an account on the Customs eServices platform; Upon having an active account, you can start using the following eServices:

VEHICLE_CERTIFICATE_REQUEST.IDENTITY_VERIFICATION_IN_MOI_IS_IN_PROGR: Identity verification is done through the Kuwait Mobile ID Application

VEHICLE_CERTIFICATE_REQUEST.Vehicle_KMI_Auth_Details: Authentication request sent to Owner and traveler through Kuwait Mobile ID for Authentication
VEHICLE_CERTIFICATE_REQUEST.Vehicle_verification_failed: The verification process failed, please try again, taking into account checking the vehicle data and responding to the alerts on the Kuwait Mobile ID Application
VEHICLE_CERTIFICATE_REQUEST.VEHICLE_PRINT_ERORR: Please pay then print your receipt
VEHICLE_CERTIFICATE_REQUEST.FILE_WILL_BE_AUTO_DOWNLOADED_ONCE_IS_REA: A file will be auto downloaded once it is ready.
VEHICLE_CERTIFICATE_REQUEST.VEHICLE_CERTIFICATE_REQUEST_NOTE_DESCRIP: Description : Through the service, a request for issuing a power of attorney for travel in a Kuwaiti vehicle can be submitted to the General Administration of Customs and review the customs administration to receive the original copy of the power of attorney.
VEHICLE_CERTIFICATE_REQUEST.Prerequisites_VEHICLE: Services Prerequisites : Kuwait Mobile Id Application
VEHICLE_CERTIFICATE_REQUEST.VEHICLE_CERTIFICATE_REQUEST_AGREEMENT_NO: I certify that all information entered in the request is correct and the approval of the request through Kuwait Mobile Id is considered as the official signature on the issuance of the power of attorney and is officially trusted. The electronic record of the General Administration of Customs is considered a reference to prove the conduct of these electronic transactions, and an acknowledgment that the data and transactions entered into the electronic services of the General Administration of Customs are dealt with without any additional review from General Administration of Customs or written notices or confirmation in other ways and that this endorsement confirms your authorization to the General Administration of Customs to carry out all procedures related to the issuance of a power of attorney without providing you with notice thereof or referring to you in any transaction and without additional written confirmation from you
VEHICLE_CERTIFICATE_REQUEST.VEHICLE_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST_SUMMARY_NO: A new Documentation and issuance of a power of attorney to travel with a Kuwaiti vehicle request will be created with the following details. Please review and then click submit
VEHICLE_CERTIFICATE_REQUEST.VEHICLE_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST_SENT_NOTE: Your request for a vehicle travel authorization has been sent successfully. You must visit the Travel Power of Attorney Issuance Center to complete the procedures. You can also keep a copy of this letter for reference when reviewing the Release Center
VEHICLE_CERTIFICATE_REQUEST.VEHICLE_AUTH_PAYMENT_NOTE: Notes: To get a copy of the vehicle authorization, please complete all payments required for (electronic stamp fees - Service Fees)
VEHICLE_CERTIFICATE_REQUEST.FILE_WILL_BE_AUTO_VIEWED_ONCE_IS_READY: A file will be auto viewed once it is ready.

The electronic record of the General Administration of Customs is considered a reference to prove the conduct of these electronic transactions, and an acknowledgment that the data and transactions entered into the electronic services of the General Administration of Customs are dealt with without any additional review from General Administration of Customs or written notices or confirmation in other ways and that this endorsement confirms your authorization to the General Administration of Customs to carry out all procedures related to the issuance of a power of attorney without providing you with notice thereof or referring to you in any transaction and without additional written confirmation from you

REGISTRATION_GULF_VEHICLE_REQUEST.PRINT_GCC_VEHICLE_LIST_NOTE: The request will be invalidated during auditing time at the General Customs Authority if any of the following dates expire: insurance expiration date, indemnity clearance expiration date, or vehicle logbook expiration date. The General Customs Authority bears no responsibility in such cases. To complete the procedures, please visit the Manifest Control at the designated Customs Clearance Outlet mentioned in the request.

PRINT_GULF_VEHICLE_REQUEST.PRINT_GCC_VEHICLE_LIST_NOTE: The request will be invalidated during auditing time at the General Customs Authority if any of the following dates expire: insurance expiration date, indemnity clearance expiration date, or vehicle logbook expiration date. The General Customs Authority bears no responsibility in such cases. To complete the procedures, please visit the Manifest Control at the designated Customs Clearance Outlet mentioned in the request.

INDIVIDUAL_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST.INDIVIDUAL_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST_NOTE_DE: A request can be submitted through this service to authorize other individuals to take or complete some customs procedures at the General Administration of Customs and to act on their behalf. The authorization will be valid for seven days from the date of creating the request.
INDIVIDUAL_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST.INDIVIDUAL_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST_AGREEME: I acknowledge the validity of all the information entered in the application, and my approval of the authentication request through the Kuwait Mobile ID application of my identity will be considered as an official approval of the authorization request. It also confirms that the information entered in the customs electronic services portal can be dealt with without the need for additional review from the General Administration of Customs, written notices, or verification in other ways. This authorization confirms the approval to proceed with the necessary procedures by the General Administration of Customs based on the established authorization.
INDIVIDUAL_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST.CIVIID_MISS_MATCH: The Requester's Civil ID No. and the Authorizer's Civil ID No. must be different
INDIVIDUAL_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST.INDIVIDUAL_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST_SUMMARY: A new request for authorizing other individuals to perform customs activities will be created with the following details. Please review the details and click 'Form Issuance'.
INDIVIDUAL_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST.FORM_BEFORE_SUBMIT_NOTE: This form data is valid for 7 days from the date of submission

AGENT_EXAM_REQUEST.SERVICE_SAVE_DRAFT_SUCCESSFULLY: Your Request Information has been Saved, you can follow and Edit by using My Requests Page

BROKER_SHARED_SERVICE.CANT_PROCEED_REASONS: You can't proceed with the request, due to one of the following reasons:
BROKER_SHARED_SERVICE.YOU_CANT_PROCEED_WITH_THE_REQUEST_BECAUS: 1. You have a pending request that should be completed; you can check it from My requests menu or by:
BROKER_SHARED_SERVICE.SECOND_REASON: 2. Kindly apply for new Broker Exam as the allowed period for New Broker License / Renewal of Broker License is expired.

REQUIRED_FIELD_MESSAGE.REQUIRED_FIELDS_MESSAGE: The Fields Marked with '*' are Required Fields

CUSTOM_SYSTEM_USER.ALL_FILES_UPLOADED_SUCCESSFULLY: The documents required for system user have been uploaded successfully
CUSTOM_SYSTEM_USER.MSG_CUSTOMS_BUSINESS_REGISTER: There are some activities you must register and add a bank guarantee for each one. Please check
CUSTOM_SYSTEM_USER.CUSTOMS_BUSINESS_COMPONENT: the Register Customs Business Activity screen
CUSTOM_SYSTEM_USER.MSG_MODEL_ASSOCIATED_USER: You have one or more users who are not associated with any activity.
CUSTOM_SYSTEM_USER.NOT_ASSOCIATED_USERS_LIST_TITLE: Custom System Users not associated with any activity

CUSTOM_SYSTEM_USER_FORM.FILL_REQUIRED_FIELDS_TO_PRINT: Fill Required Fields to print the form
CUSTOM_SYSTEM_USER_FORM.FILE_WILL_BE_AUTO_DOWNLOADED_ONCE_IS_REA: A file will be auto downloaded once it is ready.
CUSTOM_SYSTEM_USER_FORM.DEACTIVATE_CUSTOMS_SYSTEM_USER_NOTE: Deactivation of the customs system user will lead to disallowing the user to log in to the customs system.
CUSTOM_SYSTEM_USER_FORM.SELECT_CUSTOMS_BUSINESS_ACTIVITY_THAT_HA: Please select the Customs Business Activity and its allowed ports for the customs system user
CUSTOM_SYSTEM_USER_FORM.PLEASE_DOWNLOAD_FORM: Please download the user recipient form, sign it, and re-upload it before performing the action.
CUSTOM_SYSTEM_USER_FORM.NO_ACTIVITY_REGISTERED: This request cannot be applied as there is no registered or active business activity.
CUSTOM_SYSTEM_USER_FORM.PLEASE_SELECT_PORT_FOR_EACH_ACTIVITY: You have not selected the ports related to your selected activity. Please select at least one port for each selected activity
CUSTOM_SYSTEM_USER_FORM.PLEASE_CHECK_REQUESTS_FOR_ASSOCIATED_USE: The business system users associated successfully
CUSTOM_SYSTEM_USER_FORM.ASSOCIATED_USERS_DESC: There are one or more customs system users associated with this organization. Please click on Associate button to associate these users with this account. If you do not associate these users, you will not be able to register any new users.

ORGANIZATION_REGISTRATION.AUTHORIZED_SIGNATORY_CIVILID_EXPIRY_DATE: Authorized Signatory Civil ID Expiry Date

UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.USER_REGISTRATION_CLARIFICATION_TEXT: I certify that all data and documents submitted are correct, without any responsibility on the General Administration of Customs
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.PRINT_MASSAGE: Please print the registration request form, sign and stamp it with the company stamp, then upload it along with the required documents of the request as it is mandatory before sending the request

PDF_UPLOADER.YOU_HAVE_TO_UPLOAD_THE_FILE: You have to upload the file
PDF_UPLOADER.FILE_MUST_BE_PDF: File must be in PDF format
PDF_UPLOADER.INVALID_FILE_NAME: Invalid file name. It should not contain any special characters.
PDF_UPLOADER.INVALID_FILE_EXTENTIONS: Invalid file Extention. It should end with .pdf
PDF_UPLOADER.CANNOT_UPLADE: You cannot upload the document as we could not find the required license details.

USER_ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_POLICY: According to customs instructions, only one company should be linked to an account. Therefore, you should choose one of your registered companies. Other companies can be linked to separate user accounts.
USER_ACCOUNT.CANCEL_ACCOUNT_INFO: To cancel the account, please write your password and the reason for cancellation.
USER_ACCOUNT.DEACTIVATE_ACCOUNT_CANNOT_ACCESS_ACCOUNT: You will not be able to access the account after canceling it, but you can create a new account
USER_ACCOUNT.UPDATE_PROFILE_MESSAGE: Once the Mobile number is updated successfully, you will be redirected to login again, click 'OK' to confirm or 'Cancel' to cancel

CONFIRMATION_SCREEN_FOR_PAYMENT.TRANSFER_PAYMENT_GATEWAY_MASSAGE: You will be transferred to the K-NET electronic payment gateway.
CONFIRMATION_SCREEN_FOR_PAYMENT.TRANSFER_PAYMENT_GATEWAY_BROWSER_MASSAGE:
Please do not close the browser or the automated customs system to complete the process.
If you encounter a problem while paying through the electronic payment gateway, and if an error occurs during the payment process, please do not attempt to pay again before verifying your account in the bank

CUSTOMS_BUSINESS_ACTIVITY.NAME: Name
CUSTOMS_BUSINESS_ACTIVITY.NOTE_TEXT: You must complete the registration for this activity
CUSTOMS_BUSINESS_ACTIVITY.ALERT_FOR_REGISTER_ACTIVITY: You must complete registering the activities to be registered as shown on the below table before attempting to send any other request for business activity
CUSTOMS_BUSINESS_ACTIVITY.TOP_ALERT_FOR_REGISTER_ACTIVITY: You must complete the submitted business activity and add bank guarantee for it, before send any request for others activities. Please check my request screen

CUSTOMS_BUSINESS_ACTIVITY_DEACTIVATE.CUSTOMS_BUSINESS_ACTIVITY_DEACTIVATION_N: The de-activation of the customs business activity will lead to disabling the activity functionalities on the customs system for all the system users with whom this activity is associated.
CUSTOMS_BUSINESS_ACTIVITY_DEACTIVATE.CUSTOMS_BUSINESS_ACTIVITY_DEACTIVATE_SUB: This activity is associated with customs system users. The de-activation of this activity will lead to disabling its functionalities on the customs system for the users.

CUSTOMS_BUSINESS_ACTIVITY_REACTIVATE.FILE_WILL_BE_AUTO_DOWNLOADED_ONCE_IS_REA: A file will be auto downloaded once it is ready.
CUSTOMS_BUSINESS_ACTIVITY_REACTIVATE.NEED_EXTEND: cannot reactivate the BA unless a BG is extended and activated then the BA will be auto activated, do you want to navigate to the BG extend request
CUSTOMS_BUSINESS_ACTIVITY_REACTIVATE.NEED_NEW_BG: cannot reactivate the BA unless a new BG is registered and activated then the BA will be auto activated, do you want to navigate to the BG registration request

CUSTOMS_BUSINESS_ACTIVITY_REGISTER.PLEASE_FILL_OPERATORCODE_FIRST: Please fill in the OperatorCode first

CUSTOMS_BUSINESS_ACTIVITY_REGISTER.ALL_FILES_UPLOADED_SUCCESSFULLY: The documents required for Business activity have been uploaded successfully

EXPRESS_TRACKING.OGA_AGENCY_WHICH_RELATED_TO_SHIPMENT: OGA Agency which is related to this shipment
EXPRESS_TRACKING.OGA_AGENCY_NAME_BASED_ON_THE_INVOICE: OGA Agency name based on the associated invoice

EXPRESS_TRACKING.ESTIMATED_FEE_FOR_SERVICES_AS_PER_PRICE_: Estimated Fee for services as per the price list
EXPRESS_TRACKING.KWD_OF_TOTAL_CHARGES_FOR_ALL_PACKAGES: KWD of total charges for all packages
EXPRESS_TRACKING.EXPRESS_COURIER_TRACKING_INFO_TEXT_FIRST: General Administration of Customs and for clarification, the projected charges for services are calculated according to the price list and based on consolidating multiple shipments in one customs declaration by dividing the total service charges by the number of shipments.
EXPRESS_TRACKING.EXPRESS_COURIER_TRACKING_INFO_TEXT_SECON: This is indicative information about duties and service fees classified in the price list that have been charged by the General Administration of Customs. Any use or action based on this information is entirely under your own responsibility.

INSPECTION_APPOINTMENT_REQUEST.FRIDAYS_AND_FULLY_BOOKED_NOT_ALLOWED: (Fridays are not allowed to be selected)

INSPECTION_APPOINTMENT_REQUEST.ATTENDANCE_WARNING: Unattending any of inspection appointment request causes preventing the user of applying new inspection requests for {{penalty}} days, and all subsequent inspection appointments will be cancelled.

INSPECTION_APPOINTMENT_REQUEST.NOT_ALLOWED_Year: You can not search for declarations at this year

QR_CODE.note: Note: scan this QR using your KMID application to login
QR_CODE.RESET_NOTE: Note: scan this QR using your KMID application to Reset Password
QR_CODE.VALIDATION_NOTE: Note: scan this QR using your KMID application to confirm your identity
QR_CODE.SCAN_THE_QR_CODE_FOR_VERIFIFCATION: Scan the QR code for verififcation
QR_CODE.LOGIN_VALIDATION_NOTE: Please, use your KMID App to login to your account by authenticating the below QR code
QR_CODE.CIVILID_VALIDATION_NOTE: Please, use your KMID App to Verify civil id by authenticating the below QR code
QR_CODE.VERIFY_VALIDATION_NOTE: Please, use your KMID App to login to your account by authenticating the below QR code
QR_CODE.TIMER_AUTHORIZATION_FAILED: Authorization failed. Please click 'Verify Again' to restart the verification process.
QR_CODE.PENDING_STATUS_MESSAGE: Please be informed that the login with KMID service is currently under preparation and is not functioning at the moment
QR_CODE.MAINTENANCE_STATUS_MESSAGE: Please be informed that the KMID service is currently under maintenance
QR_CODE.ENTER_ACCOUNT_USING_KMID: you will enter your account using KMID only
QR_CODE.ACOUNT_VERFIYED_USING_LOGIN_KMID: Your account will be verified when you log in using KMID.
QR_CODE.NOT_USE_PASSWORD_LOGIN: You will not be able to use your password to log in
QR_CODE.RESET_VALIDATION_HEADER_NOTE: Reset Password  by authenticating the below QR code
QR_CODE.RESET_VALIDATION_NOTE: Please, use your KMID App to Reset Your Password by authenticating the below QR code
QR_CODE.STEP5: If authentication option is not available, you need to activate authentication from the app's main menu
QR_CODE.DWONLOAD_APP: you can download app from here
QR_CODE.SELECT_ACTIVATE: Select Activate Authentication from the main menu
QR_CODE.FOLLOW_STEPS: Follow the steps to activate authentication
QR_CODE.TIMMER_AUTHORIZATION_FAILED: Timer has expired. Please click Verify again to start re-verification.
QR_CODE.USER_REDIRECT_CONFIRMATION_MSG: Once your Civil ID is validated with Kuwait Mobile ID, you will be logged out of the system. You can then log in again using the KMID feature.
QR_CODE.USER_REDIRECT_CONFIRMATION_RESET_PASS: Once you confirm the password reset, you will be logged out automatically. Please log in again using your new password to regain access.
QR_CODE.USER_REDIRECT_TO_FORGOT_ACCOUNT_CREDENTI: A mismatch was detected between the entered Civil ID and the one scanned via Kuwait Mobile ID. You will now be redirected to the account update page to revise your Civil ID.
QR_CODE.ACCOUNT_VERIFIED_SUCCESSFULLY: Account verification with Kuwait Mobile ID has been completed successfully.
QR_CODE.ACCOUNT_VERIFIED_ERROR: There was an issue verifying your account with Kuwait Mobile ID. Please try again later.
QR_CODE.PASSWORD_RESET_SUCCESSFULLY: Your password has been successfully updated. For security, you will be logged out;please re-login with your new password to access the system.
QR_CODE.PASSWORD_RESET_ERROR: Something went wrong during the password reset. Please try again shortly.

USER_RESET_PASSWORD.EMAIL_INFO_MESSAGE: Please enter a valid email address.
USER_RESET_PASSWORD.PASSWORD_PATTERN_ERROR: Password must meet the required pattern.
USER_RESET_PASSWORD.NEW_CONFIRM_MUST_DIFFERENT: New Password and COnfirm Password Must Be Matches
USER_RESET_PASSWORD.CURRENT_NEW_MUST_DIFFERENT: Please choose a new password that isn't the same as your current one.
USER_RESET_PASSWORD.NEW_CONFIRM_MUST_MATCH: Please ensure the new password and confirm password fields are identical.
